TEXT.TITLE: RAMADA INC <RAM> FILES FOR NOTE OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Ramada Inc said it filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission covering a proposed offering of 100 mln dlrs of 12-year subordinated notes through underwriter Salomon Brothers Inc. Net proceeds from the offering will be used to repay debt and to fund its capital expenditure program, Ramada said. Reuter
